verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> speaks <S%G3004><s%> expressly, <S%G4490><s%> that in the latter <S%G5305><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> shall depart <S%G868><s%> from the faith, <S%G4102><s%> giving heed <S%G4337><s%> to seducing <S%G4108><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and doctrines <S%G1319><s%> of devils; <S%G1140><s%>
Speaking <S%G5573><s%> lies <S%G5573><s%> in hypocrisy; <S%G5272><s%> having their conscience <S%G4893><s%> seared <S%G2743><s%> with a hot <S%G2743><s%> iron;

Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> to marry, <S%G1060><s%> and commanding to abstain <S%G567><s%> from meats, <S%G1033><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has created <S%G2936><s%> to be received <S%G3336><s%> with thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> of them which believe <S%G4103><s%> and know <S%G1921><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2938><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is good, <S%G2570><s%> and nothing <S%G3762><s%> to be refused, <S%G579><s%> if it be received <S%G2983><s%> with thanksgiving: <S%G2169><s%>
For it is sanctified <S%G37><s%> by the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and prayer. <S%G1783><s%>

If you put <S%G5294><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> in remembrance <S%G5294><s%> of these <S%G5023><s%> things, you shall be a good <S%G2570><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> nourished <S%G1789><s%> up in the words <S%G3056><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and of good <S%G2570><s%> doctrine, <S%G1319><s%> whereunto <S%G3739><s%> you have attained. <S%G3877><s%>
But refuse <S%G3868><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and old <S%G1126><s%> wives' <S%G1126><s%> fables, <S%G3454><s%> and exercise <S%G1128><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> rather to godliness. <S%G2150><s%>

For bodily <S%G4984><s%> exercise <S%G1129><s%> profits <S%G5624><s%> <S%G2076><s%> little: <S%G3641><s%> but godliness <S%G2150><s%> is profitable <S%G5624><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> things, having <S%G2192><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%> of the life <S%G2222><s%> that now <S%G3568><s%> is, and of that which is to come. <S%G3195><s%>
This <S%G3588><s%> is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> and worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptation. <S%G594><s%>

For therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we both <S%G2532><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> and suffer reproach, <S%G3679><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we trust <S%G1679><s%> in the living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the Savior <S%G4990><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> specially <S%G3122><s%> of those that believe. <S%G4103><s%>

Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> your youth; <S%G3503><s%> but be you an example <S%G5179><s%> of the believers, <S%G4103><s%> in word, <S%G3056><s%> in conversation, <S%G391><s%> in charity, <S%G26><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> in faith, <S%G4102><s%> in purity. <S%G47><s%>
Till <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> give attendance <S%G4337><s%> to reading, <S%G320><s%> to exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> to doctrine. <S%G1319><s%>

Neglect <S%G272><s%> not the gift <S%G5486><s%> that is in you, which <S%G3739><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> you by prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> with the laying <S%G1936><s%> on <S%G1936><s%> of the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the presbytery. <S%G4244><s%>

Meditate <S%G3191><s%> on these <S%G5023><s%> things; give <S%G2468><s%> yourself wholly <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1722><s%> to them; that your profiting <S%G4297><s%> may appear <S%G5318><s%> <S%G5600><s%> to all. <S%G3956><s%>

Take heed <S%G1907><s%> to yourself, <S%G4572><s%> and to the doctrine; <S%G1319><s%> continue <S%G1961><s%> in them: for in doing <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> you shall both <S%G2532><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> yourself, <S%G4572><s%> and them that hear <S%G191><s%> you.
